sentences.en: Airway Colonization and Gastric Aspiration After Lung Transplantation : Do Birds of a Feather Flock Together?
sentences.cn: 肺移植手术后胃内容物与气道菌落定植: 不是说“人以群分、物以类聚” 吗 ?

sentences.en: As news reached Europe It'sparked a wave of explorations and ultimately colonization.
sentences.cn: 消息传到欧洲后激发起了探险者的热潮并最终导致了美洲的殖民地化.

sentences.en: At its very worst, this leads to a new and hideous kind of colonization.
sentences.cn: 最坏的时候, 这种保护会导致新的和可怕的殖民地.

sentences.en: Burn patients are febrile before there is sinificant bacterial colonization of born wound.
sentences.cn: 烧伤病人在伤口有显著的细菌集落生长以前就可以发热.

sentences.en: Colonization of a calcareous stripmine spoil by earthworms promoted incorporation of organic matter.
sentences.cn: 在石灰质露天矿引入蚯蚓,则促进有机物的结合.

sentences.en: Entomologists have tended to underestimate the importance of colonization through dispersal.
sentences.cn: 昆虫学家倾向于低估在扩散过程中定居现象的重要性.

sentences.en: It permits a population to spread population increases, and it enables the colonization of new sites.
sentences.cn: 它使得种群在其增长的时候得以扩展它的分布区域并移居到新的场所.

sentences.en: Let us leave behind the legacy of both colonization and communism, the tyranny of drug cartels, dictators and sham elections.
sentences.cn: 让我们摆脱殖民主义和共产主义的遗祸，抵制暴政和贩毒集团，摈弃独裁者和假选举。

sentences.en: No change in FEV 1 , sputum inflammatory markers or bacterial colonization was seen.
sentences.cn: 痰炎症标志或细菌定植均无变化.

sentences.en: Results Between breast - feeding bottle - feeding infants, the colonization level of MS showed no difference.
sentences.cn: 结果不同喂养方式婴儿间MS定殖水平无差别.

sentences.en: The colonization of N America by the British and French.
sentences.cn: 英国和法国对北美洲的殖民地化.

sentences.en: The colonization of rhizobia on the roots of legumes and nonlegumes has been well documented.
sentences.cn: 豆科和非豆科植物根上瘤菌的群集现象曾被很好地证实过.

sentences.en: The dual - element colonies was one of the three major categories of colonies formed during colonization.
sentences.cn: 二元 型 殖民地是殖民化中形成的三种主要类型的殖民地之一.

sentences.en: The English, French, and Spanish took part in the colonization of North America.
sentences.cn: 英国, 法国和西班牙都参与了北美的开垦.

sentences.en: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.cn: 他们了解殖民、革命还有移民。

sentences.en: We also substituted “settlement” for “colonization” in the title of the book.
sentences.cn: 本书标题中原先使用的“殖民”一词，也用“移民”代替。

sentences.en: What is the process of colonization?
sentences.cn: 殖民地化的过程又是怎样？
